text: The Italy national under-17 football team represents Italy in youth international football completions. They have appeared at the FIFA U-17 World Cup eight times including hosting the 1991 edition. Their best finish is fourth place at the 1987 edition. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA Under-17 World Cup=== Year Round Position FIFA Under-16 World Championship FIFA Under-16 World Championship FIFA
